[Y]Drum Illusions
[W]Noise plus shape equals punch.
[c][m.]
[W]Noise bursts and fast pitch movement
[W]can create convincing rhythm accents.
[W]Small timing offsets prevent patterns
[W]from feeling robotic.
[c][m.]
[G]- Short noise burst.
[G]- Pitch drop for kick feel.
[G]- Vary timing slightly.
[m][m-]
[Y]RHYTHM LAB
[C]Variation creates life.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
